newData.title: NX Finance
newData.description:
NX Finance is an AirdropFi and yield aggregator on Solana offering 10X leverage on Jupiter's JLP token. More leveraged opportunities are coming soon. NX Finance has been audited by Slowmist. NX Finance have introduced the Point Nadventure where users can trade and lend assets on the platform to earn points. The platform offers leveraged JLP exposure to farm the Jupiter airdrop. Users can earn TVL points and referral points for a potential airdrop from NX Finance too.

Step-by-Step Guide:
1. Head to NX Finance, connect your Solana wallet.
2. You’ll need JLP tokens to enable leverage, which can be bought from the Jupiter DEX.
3. Enter the amount of JLP to deposit and the amount of USDC to borrow.
4. Click on “Add” and approve the transaction from your wallet.
5. As per the latest updates, users can use vSOL as a part of the JLP leverage strategy.
6. 1M vPoints will be distributed weekly to users who leverage JLP with vSOL collateral at a minimum of 1.01x leverage.
7. Users can also lend USDC to facilitate other users’ margin trades from the “Lend” page to earn points.
8. TVL points are earned by depositing and lending. For each $1 lent, 3 points per day are earned. Each $1 deposited earns 1 point per day.
9. TVL points are also boosted by taking part in the Xcellerator quests on the “Airdrop” page.
10. Users can also earn points through referrals via the “Airdrop” page. Generate your code to earn 10% of all TVL vault points from friends.
11. Create a team via the “Airdrop” page to unlock a bonus boost where higher team deposits give a higher team boost.
12. For more details, check out this page from NX Finance’s docs.
13. Follow NX Finance on X for further product announcements.

newData.title: Grass
newData.description:
Grass.io leverages unused bandwidth to train AI models by installing a node on users' devices. Once installed, the node operates passively, occasionally routing web requests to compile data for AI labs. This data is sold to AI labs, rewarding users with Grass Points, which may convert to cryptocurrency in the future. Users earn more by referring others, with a 20% bonus on the Grass Points accumulated by those referred and additional tiers for extended referrals.

Updated Information:
Grass.io has expanded its ecosystem significantly. They introduced a tiered points system that offers various bonuses for referrals and uptime. Users can track their progress and points through a detailed dashboard that shows points earned each month, with a new epoch system for reward distribution.

Grass operates in over 190 countries, collecting over 1TB of data daily, and it is continually growing.

Step-by-Step Guide to Using Grass.io:
1. **Download Grass**:
   - Visit [Grass.io](https://www.getgrass.io) and download the Grass extension for Chrome.
   - Add Grass as a Chrome extension by clicking "Add extension" and confirming the permissions.

2. **Register**:
   - Click on the Grass icon in your browser and select "Register".
   - Sign up using your email, create a username and password, agree to the terms and conditions, and complete the CAPTCHA.
   - You might need a referral code to sign up, which can be found on social media platforms like Twitter.

3. **Activate the Node**:
   - Log in to the Grass extension with your new account.
   - Click "Connect" to activate the node. Your device will now operate as a Grass node, contributing unused bandwidth.

4. **Earn Points**:
   - Keep the extension active to earn Grass Points as your device routes web requests.
   - Refer friends using your personalized referral code to earn additional points (20% of their earnings).

5. **Monitor and Boost Points**:
   - Use the dashboard to track your points and referral progress.
   - Participate in Grass's incentivized programs and quests to boost your points further.

6. **Utilize Additional Features**:
   - Users can also earn more points by ensuring their referred users reach 100 hours of uptime, which triggers additional bonuses.
   - The tiered ranking system rewards users with bonuses as they climb higher by earning more points or referring more users.

For more detailed instructions and updates, check out [Grass.io’s documentation](https://www.getgrass.io/docs) and follow their social media channels for the latest announcements.

newData.title: Socrates GPT
newData.description:
Socrates GPT leverages advanced X-Gen AI to enhance the Web3 ecosystem by providing tools for market analysis, community engagement, content creation, and strategic decision-making. The platform utilizes the SGX token within its ecosystem for DAO voting, staking, and accessing various AI tools. Users earn by referring others, with incentives linked to their referral's activities.

Updated Information:
Socrates GPT has significantly expanded its offerings, introducing a sophisticated referral system that encourages user engagement and contribution. This system rewards users with SGX tokens, enhancing their influence within the community and providing various utilities within the ecosystem.

Socrates GPT operates globally, aiming to integrate AI tools across multiple sectors, making substantial impacts on data handling and analytics.

Step-by-Step Guide to Participating in the Socrates GPT Airdrop:
1. **Register and Install**:
   - Visit [SocratesGPT.io](https://www.socratesgpt.io) and sign up.
   - Follow the instructions to install any necessary software or extensions.

2. **Engage with the Platform**:
   - Connect with Socrates GPT on platforms like Twitter and Discord to stay updated with the latest news and events.
   - Actively participate in community discussions and initiatives.

3. **Referral Program**:
   - Share your unique referral link to invite friends to the platform.
   - Increase your chances of earning more SGX tokens by boosting your referral numbers and ensuring they are active within the community.

4. **KYC Verification**:
   - Complete the KYC process as required to qualify for token rewards.

5. **Earn and Track Your Rewards**:
   - Monitor your referrals and rankings through the Socrates GPT dashboard.
   - Participate in additional activities announced on the platform to maximize your earnings.

For detailed information and regular updates, check the official Socrates GPT documentation and follow their social media channels.

newData.title: Clout
newData.description:
Clout is a revolutionary meme coin launched by rap superstar Offset, inspired by his hit song "Clout" with Cardi B. Built on the Solana blockchain, Clout promises high-quality content, an animated meme series, major announcements, and strategic partnerships. The $CLOUT token aims to be listed on major decentralized exchanges like Raydium and Orca, with future plans for centralized exchange listings. The project includes a large-scale marketing campaign and listings on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko.

Updated Information:
The Clout project aims to provide significant rewards for hodlers and includes plans for large-scale marketing campaigns. The token is set to list on major exchanges, which could increase its visibility and adoption.

Step-by-Step Guide to Participating in the Clout Airdrop:
1. **Launch the CLOUT bot**:
   - Visit the [Clout Telegram bot](https://t.me/The_Clout_bot/Clout?startapp=NzEwNjEzNDE4Mw==) to get started.

2. **Complete Tasks**:
   - Engage in the tasks available in the bot to earn CLOUDS.

3. **Referral Program**:
   - Share your referral link with friends to earn more CLOUDS.
   - The top 250 inviters win $100 worth of $CLOUT each.

4. **Participate in Contests**:
   - Comment your Solana wallet address on specified posts to participate in the $CLOUT Contest for a chance to win $100 worth of $CLOUT.

5. **Presale Participation**:
   - The token presale starts on July 30th, 5PM UTC. Ensure to check their website and social media for the presale address.

For more detailed information and updates, you can follow their official [Telegram](https://t.me/The_Clout_bot/Clout?startapp=NzEwNjEzNDE4Mw==) and [Twitter](https://x.com/OffsetYRN) channels.

Users can earn TVL points and referral points for a potential airdrop from NX Finance too.

Step-by-Step Guide:
1. Head to NX Finance, connect your Solana wallet.
2. You’ll need JLP tokens to enable leverage, which can be bought from the Jupiter DEX.
3. Enter the amount of JLP to deposit and the amount of USDC to borrow.
4. Click on “Add” and approve the transaction from your wallet.
5. As per the latest updates, users can use vSOL as a part of the JLP leverage strategy.
6. 1M vPoints will be distributed weekly to users who leverage JLP with vSOL collateral at a minimum of 1.01x leverage.
7. Users can also lend USDC to facilitate other users’ margin trades from the “Lend” page to earn points.
8. TVL points are earned by depositing and lending. For each $1 lent, 3 points per day are earned. Each $1 deposited earns 1 point per day.
9. TVL points are also boosted by taking part in the Xcellerator quests on the “Airdrop” page.
10. Users can also earn points through referrals via the “Airdrop” page. Generate your code to earn 10% of all TVL vault points from friends.
11. Create a team via the “Airdrop” page to unlock a bonus boost where higher team deposits give a higher team boost.
12. For more details, check out this page from NX Finance’s docs.
13. Follow NX Finance on X for further product announcements.

newData.title: Grass
newData.description:
Grass.io leverages unused bandwidth to train AI models by installing a node on users' devices. Once installed, the node operates passively, occasionally routing web requests to compile data for AI labs. This data is sold to AI labs, rewarding users with Grass Points, which may convert to cryptocurrency in the future. Users earn more by referring others, with a 20% bonus on the Grass Points accumulated by those referred and additional tiers for extended referrals.

Updated Information:
Grass.io has expanded its ecosystem significantly. They introduced a tiered points system that offers various bonuses for referrals and uptime. Users can track their progress and points through a detailed dashboard that shows points earned each month, with a new epoch system for reward distribution.

Grass operates in over 190 countries, collecting over 1TB of data daily, and it is continually growing.

Step-by-Step Guide to Using Grass.io:
1. **Download Grass**:
   - Visit [Grass.io](https://www.getgrass.io) and download the Grass extension for Chrome.
   - Add Grass as a Chrome extension by clicking "Add extension" and confirming the permissions.

2. **Register**:
   - Click on the Grass icon in your browser and select "Register".
   - Sign up using your email, create a username and password, agree to the terms and conditions, and complete the CAPTCHA.
   - You might need a referral code to sign up, which can be found on social media platforms like Twitter.

3. **Activate the Node**:
   - Log in to the Grass extension with your new account.
   - Click "Connect" to activate the node. Your device will now operate as a Grass node, contributing unused bandwidth.

4. **Earn Points**:
   - Keep the extension active to earn Grass Points as your device routes web requests.
   - Refer friends using your personalized referral code to earn additional points (20% of their earnings).

5. **Monitor and Boost Points**:
   - Use the dashboard to track your points and referral progress.
   - Participate in Grass's incentivized programs and quests to boost your points further.

6. **Utilize Additional Features**:
   - Users can also earn more points by ensuring their referred users reach 100 hours of uptime, which triggers additional bonuses.
   - The tiered ranking system rewards users with bonuses as they climb higher by earning more points or referring more users.

For more detailed instructions and updates, check out [Grass.io’s documentation](https://www.getgrass.io/docs) and follow their social media channels for the latest announcements.

newData.title: Socrates GPT
newData.description:
Socrates GPT leverages advanced X-Gen AI to enhance the Web3 ecosystem by providing tools for market analysis, community engagement, content creation, and strategic decision-making. The platform utilizes the SGX token within its ecosystem for DAO voting, staking, and accessing various AI tools. Users earn by referring others, with incentives linked to their referral's activities.

Updated Information:
Socrates GPT has significantly expanded its offerings, introducing a sophisticated referral system that encourages user engagement and contribution. This system rewards users with SGX tokens, enhancing their influence within the community and providing various utilities within the ecosystem.

Socrates GPT operates globally, aiming to integrate AI tools across multiple sectors, making substantial impacts on data handling and analytics.

Step-by-Step Guide to Participating in the Socrates GPT Airdrop:
1. **Register and Install**:
   - Visit [SocratesGPT.io](https://www.socratesgpt.io) and sign up.
   - Follow the instructions to install any necessary software or extensions.

2. **Engage with the Platform**:
   - Connect with Socrates GPT on platforms like Twitter and Discord to stay updated with the latest news and events.
   - Actively participate in community discussions and initiatives.

3. **Referral Program**:
   - Share your unique referral link to invite friends to the platform.
   - Increase your chances of earning more SGX tokens by boosting your referral numbers and ensuring they are active within the community.

4. **KYC Verification**:
   - Complete the KYC process as required to qualify for token rewards.

5. **Earn and Track Your Rewards**:
   - Monitor your referrals and rankings through the Socrates GPT dashboard.
   - Participate in additional activities announced on the platform to maximize your earnings.

For detailed information and regular updates, check the official Socrates GPT documentation and follow their social media channels.

newData.title: Clout
newData.description:
Clout is a revolutionary meme coin launched by rap superstar Offset, inspired by his hit song "Clout" with Cardi B. Built on the Solana blockchain, Clout promises high-quality content, an animated meme series, major announcements, and strategic partnerships. The $CLOUT token aims to be listed on major decentralized exchanges like Raydium and Orca, with future plans for centralized exchange listings. The project includes a large-scale marketing campaign and listings on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko.

Updated Information:
The Clout project aims to provide significant rewards for hodlers and includes plans for large-scale marketing campaigns. The token is set to list on major exchanges, which could increase its visibility and adoption.

Step-by-Step Guide to Participating in the Clout Airdrop:
1. **Launch the CLOUT bot**:
   - Visit the [Clout Telegram bot](https://t.me/The_Clout_bot/Clout?startapp=NzEwNjEzNDE4Mw==) to get started.

2. **Complete Tasks**:
   - Engage in the tasks available in the bot to earn CLOUDS.

3. **Referral Program**:
   - Share your referral link with friends to earn more CLOUDS.
   - The top 250 inviters win $100 worth of $CLOUT each.

4. **Participate in Contests**:
   - Comment your Solana wallet address on specified posts to participate in the $CLOUT Contest for a chance to win $100 worth of $CLOUT.

5. **Presale Participation**:
   - The token presale starts on July 30th, 5PM UTC. Ensure to check their website and social media for the presale address.

For more detailed information and updates, you can follow their official [Telegram](https://t.me/The_Clout_bot/Clout?startapp=NzEwNjEzNDE4Mw==) and [Twitter](https://x.com/OffsetYRN) channels.
